messages.title: A fresh voice for fairness
messages.content: Vote Green for a hung parliament.

messages.title: Greens 10 points ahead of Labour here
messages.content: Parliament needs reform, and a Tory or Labour MP will block the changes we urgently need to improve British politics. As an MEP for the past 11 years who has led the way on transparency on expenses, I've got the experience to champion positive changes and have served my constituents tirelessly.

messages.title: Say no to Tory cuts and vote Green when your postal vote arrives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Parliament needs reform to improve British politics.
Champion positive changes in transparency on expenses.
Work with likeminded MPs for jobs, fair wages.
Scrap the Trident & ID cards projects.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Greens are well ahead of Labour in the polls here, have won every election here since 2007, and Greens hold more council seats here than any other party.

issues.governance: Parliament needs reform to improve British politics.

leaflet.personalStatement: As an MEP for the past 11 years who has led the way on transparency on expenses, I've got the experience to champion positive changes and have served my constituents tirelessly.

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the way on transparency on expenses and championed positive changes.

images.caption: Caroline Lucas standing before the Houses of Parliament.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Greens hold more council seats here than any other party. Since 2005 the election boundaries have changed, adding another Green-held area to this constituency.
